haibison.android.lockpattern.utils

Class AlpSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • haibison.android.lockpattern.utils.AlpSettings

  • public class AlpSettings
extends Object
    All settings for the library. They are stored in SharedPreferences.

    For some options, you can set them directly via tag <meta-data> inside tag <activity> in your AndroidManifest.xml. Refer to setter methods for details. Note that the values in the manifest have higher priority than the ones from this class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Display preferences.
      static class  AlpSettings.Security
      Security preferences.

      • setupPreferenceManager

        public static void setupPreferenceManager(Context context,
                                          PreferenceManager pm)
        Setup pm to use global unique filename and global access mode. You must use this method if you let the user change preferences via UI, such as PreferenceActivity, PreferenceFragment...
        Parameters:
        context - the context.
        pm - PreferenceManager.
